pages.text: This entry is a work in progress. Juni Knytt has showcased some potentially game-breaking sandwiches. $(br2)Just to provide context, you can apply potion effects to your sandwiches... and each potion will be a separate layer on that sandwich. Can you imagine HOW USEFUL this is??

$(li)Step 1: Make Bread. $(li)Step 2: Either send the bread through Create's Mechanical Saw or cut it yourself with a Farmer's Delight knife. $(li)Step 3: Place Bread Slice on station. $(li)Step 4: ASSEMBLE... YOUR SANDWICH!
